channel.title: Game Music themes; Best of
channel.description:
Well Thought I might start a topic on Best Game Music Themes. I'll start with a Command & Conquer theme Hell March 2 & 1 :smiley:
[COLOR='DeepSkyBlue'] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tb-gI_pFog0']Hell March I[/url] [/SIZE]
[COLOR='DeepSkyBlue'] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9WqwFhX6Cqg']Hell March II[/url][/SIZE]
![](upload://Pia1ziG56iXgyEAdYZzXHCjlTl.jpeg)

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: Haze
item.description:
Additionals:

Professor Layton’s Theme
Molgera Battle Music (Legend of Zelda: Wind Waker)
Super Mario Galaxy: Bouy Base
Super Mario Galaxy: Blue Sky Athletics

Blue Sky Athletics was a redo of:
Super Mario Bros. 3: Overworld 2

And probably the most awesome On-Rails shooter music ever:
Space Armada (Starfox (US/JP) / Starwing (PAL))

Read full topic

saivert:

You guys forgot the Amiga classic Turrican 2 with one of the best captivating intro songs.

If you had bothered to read (or search) you’d find it was the first thing I suggested.

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: Mith
item.description:
The game with the best soundtrack for me has to be Chrono Cross. The game’s entire soundtrack is downright amazing.

Besides, it’s intro clip not only has the most epic track, but it’s also pretty much the best intro clip for any game ever (imo of course): Chrono Cross Intro.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Might and Magic 6

Well it’s not really the theme, just one song in the beautiful soundtrack. This song is called Moonlit Snow Journey, also known as L.A. Woman*.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oZ5XjRBTEpU

*the devs were fans of The Doors so they named their tracks with Doors’ songs[/SIZE]

Read full topic

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
You guys forgot the Amiga classic Turrican 2 with one of the best captivating intro songs.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fvha_2hAzq0

Also Level 1:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmmslIbjfH8

Maybe it was just because I was a kid back then, but I will never forget this game and it’s music.
Sure it was a pretty standard platform shooter, but the music made it worthwhile.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Are you serious? Nobody has mention Streets of Rage yet? What the hell is wrong with you people?

Listen to these and tell me it’s not effin’ epic.
https://www.streetsofrage.net/Streets_of_Rage_2_Original_Soundtrack_03_Never_Return_Alive.mp3
https://www.streetsofrage.net/Streets_of_Rage_2_Original_Soundtrack_13_Back_to_the_Industry.mp3
https://www.streetsofrage.net/Streets_of_Rage_2_Original_Soundtrack_14_Expander.mp3

Also, most people have no idea how epic doom music really is. Sadly, today’s midi engines are nothing like they were on the Sound Blaster cards when Doom was released. For instance: in E1M8, the ‘disco’ sound wasn’t there, instead it was a guitar pluck.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: soybostero93
item.description:
I loved Age of Mythology and Age of Empires 3’s soundtrack.
Also, the Doom 3 menu music and Iron Man’s starting track (Black Sabbath) are great too.

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: Skaevola
item.description:
Woah woah woah, you guys even mentioned Doom and didn’t say anything about E1M8 “The Sign of Evil”? Best. Video game music. Ever.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WS2sh50Sbqg

I don’t know who was playing lead guitar for this remix, but it isn’t as good as his other remixes (it’s off-beat and kind of clumsy, I play it better), but the music itself is still GODLIKE.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: Haze
item.description:
Godot’s Theme from Phoenix Wright 3:
The Fragrance of Dark Coffee

And this, which, imo, is probably the best boss theme from all the FF’s:
The Battle with Golbez’s Four Emperors (DS)
The Battle with Golbez’s Four Emperors (SNES)
The Dissidia version totally ruined it T_T

Also FF3 Final Boss

I would have posted some of the more recent ones but other people got there first :rolleyes:

EDIT: Also the ENTIRE OST for the Golden Sun series on GBA

Read full topic

item.title: Game Music themes; Best of
item.dc:creator: Duck
item.description:
Spooks:

Meat Circus theme > everything else.

EA made a pretty nice rehash of Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star with Dead Space: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4-FPrnM65A&fmt=18

I encourage you to go to YouTube and search for the whole soundtrack of the game. Great stuff.

damn I liked that, gives me chills, but Ive never played dead space, I think you just sold me it! :awesome:

Read full topic

Meat Circus theme > everything else.

EA made a pretty nice rehash of Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star with Dead Space: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4-FPrnM65A&fmt=18

I encourage you to go to YouTube and search for the whole soundtrack of the game. Great stuff.
